name: Reflectivity
description:
Reflectivity is a relaxing puzzle game that is great to play on the go or when relaxing from a busy day. 

Move the player block to move the clone block to the goal! Use the obstacles to your advantage to reach the goal. Can you decipher how your movement reflects up top?

Features of Reflectivity:

• This is a relaxing game with no timers.

• Fully playable offline.

• Currently 60 unique levels for you to enjoy.

• One finger control.
